attributes.action: Suspend all UK Hospital car parking charges during the Covid 19 crisis.
attributes.additional_details:
During this time of national crisis when many people will be under huge economic pressure, suspending hospital car parking charges would be a popular decision for people, and not be a huge cost. 
This is in line with the government policy to provide the NHS with "whatever it needs" at this time. It would provide an important symbolic gesture, especially for families & staff facing great stress & distress.

This would be a popular decision, with a finite time limit, in line with current policy
attributes.background:
Suspend hospital car parking charges for visitors and staff during the Covid 19 crisis. The government must compensate NHS Trusts, rather than requiring them to shoulder this extra burden.
This is in line with the government policy to provide the NHS with whatever it needs at this time.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government have announced that they will provide free car parking for all NHS and social care staff. You can read more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-to-provide-free-car-parking-for-nhs-and-social-care-staff

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
